1010000100101001 1010011001100011 1 -> sum: 0100011110001101, cout: 1

1100011110110000 0111001010101000 0 -> sum: 0011101001011000, cout: 1
1101110011001001 0010111100101100 1 -> sum: 0000101111110110, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
